title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.109 - Confidential communications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.109 - Confidential communications

State Regulations

For the purpose of duties arising out of article 33 of the Public Health Law and provisions of this Part, no communication made to a practitioner shall be deemed confidential within the meaning of the Civil Practice Law and Rules relating to confidential communications between such practitioner and patient.
